name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Node.js Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in high-performance application development. Proficient in **Node.js**, **API** design, and implementing **REST**ful services, with hands-on expertise in **React** for frontend development. Skilled in deploying cloud-native systems using **Docker** and integrating **OAuth2**, **SAML**, and **SSO** for secure authentication. Experienced in establishing **CI/CD** pipelines and leveraging **infrastructure-as-code** practices to enhance development workflows. 
Strong communicator adept at documentation and debugging, ensuring a seamless development process. Previously developed AI/ML platforms with predictive analytics capabilities and deep expertise in **Golang**. Committed to implementing compliance-driven solutions aligned with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.

• Delivered tutorials and documentation for best practices in **Node.js** development, fostering a culture of continuous learning within the team.
• Led troubleshooting efforts for production issues, resulting in a **30% decrease** in resolution times by utilizing effective debugging practices and team communication.
